Mr* Richard L« Rider
Manager* ff-IEB Tape network
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dicks
Shortly before the switch I had had some correspondence
with Si Sigel concerning a series of lectures here on wFreedom in
the Modem World*—a classroom course which we broadcast during
the first semester* Si wanted it for WfO and possibly the NAEB
network*
I have received permission from the course committee
and the lecturers to make the broadcasts available to the HASB if
its interested*
Personally, I feel the lectures are first rate and
most timely* I’m enclosing a descriptive bulletin and if you
are sufficiently stimulated, I’ll be glad to send audition tapes.
Good luck In the new venture*
Sincerely yours,
William G* Earley
Program Director, MHI
